home.title: Order Confirmations
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Order Confirmation

orderConfirmation.created: A new Order Confirmation is created with identifier {{ param }}
orderConfirmation.updated: A Order Confirmation is updated with identifier {{ param }}
orderConfirmation.deleted: A Order Confirmation is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Order Confirmation {{ id }}?

help.total: total amount of the delivery note
help.vatIncluded: whether prices in delivery note include VAT
help.discountType: optional discount type; possible values: A - amount, P - in %
help.language: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,
help.pageAmount: how many pages the document has
help.status: status of order confirmation, possible values: DR - draft, S - sent, B - billed, D - deleted (but still visible)
